meanings.definition: Not conforming to the usual type or pattern
meanings.sent1: The atypically colored flower stood out in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The atypically warm weather in December surprised everyone.
meanings.sent3: The atypically quiet dog suddenly started barking at the mailman.
meanings.sent4: Her atypically bold fashion choice turned heads at the party.
meanings.sent5: The atypically large snowflake landed softly on her nose.

meanings.definition: In a way that is not typical or characteristic
meanings.sent1: She atypically arrived early for the meeting.
meanings.sent2: He atypically chose to take the scenic route home.
meanings.sent3: The cat atypically meowed loudly at the sight of a cucumber.
meanings.sent4: The idea atypically sparked a wave of creativity in the team.
meanings.sent5: The atypically long line at the grocery store moved surprisingly quickly.
